body_html:
Oops let me clarify something; I modified the source of the Estimator so that when get_eval_ops is called it passes the Predictions and Label (using argmax for both, label post one-hot) instead of the probabilities so other metrics could be used. Just remembered I did that earlier and forgot before I posted this. The AUC I've been receiving has been accurate after modification.

Shouldn't the AUC metric not fail if I'm passing in solely the predictions and labels as tf.int32 with the default threshold value?
